title.narrative: Comprehensive Disaster Risk Management Programme

description.narrative: The Comprehensive Disaster Risk Management Programme (CDRMP) has been formulated as part of the Strategic Partnership Framework signed between the BCPR and UNDP. The project is aligned with UNDP Strategic Plan Outcome 5 & UNDAF Outcome 7.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.C.2

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct support of livelihood in: Private sector (If YES, please provide Number of livelihoods supported)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.A.1

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Policy, legal, regulatory and institutional frameworks

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.3.1.1.1

description.narrative: Country has data-informed development and investment plans that incorporate integrated solutions to reduce disaster risks and enable climate change adaptation and mitigation

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.B.2

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct creation of employment in: Private sector (If YES, please provide Number of employment created)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.1.1.3.C

description.narrative: Number of people benefitting from jobs and improved livelihoods in crisis or post-crisis settings, disaggregated by sex and other characteristics (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Male
